akn:section.akn:heading: Limitations on sale of zinc-carbon batteries containing mercury

akn:content.akn:p: § 14333. Limitations on sale of zinc-carbon batteries containing mercury No person shall sell, offer for sale, or offer for promotional purposes any zinc-carbon battery manufactured on or after May 13, 1996, that contains mercury that was intentionally introduced as described in section 14332 of this title. (Pub. L. 104–142, title II, § 204, May 13, 1996, 110 Stat. 1336.)
